code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={value:{gid:'',lid:'',iid:'',name:'',type:''}};var dragSlice=createSlice({name:'draggedItem',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setDraggedItem:function setDraggedItem(state,action){state.value=action.payload;},resetDraggedItem:function resetDraggedItem(state){state.value=initialState.value;}}});var _dragSlice$actions=dragSlice.actions,setDraggedItem=_dragSlice$actions.setDraggedItem,resetDraggedItem=_dragSlice$actions.resetDraggedItem;export{setDraggedItem,resetDraggedItem};export var selectDraggedItem=function selectDraggedItem(state){return state.draggedItem.value;};export default dragSlice.reducer;
